dynamic-hibernate-statement.sql-query: SELECT role1.role_id AS roleId, role1.role_name AS roleName, GROUP_CONCAT(cp.menu_name SEPARATOR ' | ') AS enRoleName FROM credit_db.sp_role role1 LEFT JOIN credit_db.sp_role_menu rp on role1.role_id=rp.role_id LEFT JOIN credit_db.sp_menu cp on cp.menu_id=rp.MENU_ID WHERE role1.status != '-1' <#if roleName ?exists> AND role1.role_name LIKE '%${roleName}%' </#if> GROUP BY roleId,roleName ORDER BY role1.create_time DESC, roleId ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT role1.role_id AS roleId, role1.role_name AS roleName, GROUP_CONCAT(cp.menu_name SEPARATOR ' | ') AS menuName FROM credit_db.sp_role role1 LEFT JOIN credit_db.sp_role_menu rp on role1.role_id=rp.role_id LEFT JOIN credit_db.sp_menu cp on cp.menu_id=rp.MENU_ID WHERE role1.status != '-1' <#if roleName ?exists> AND role1.role_name LIKE '%${roleName}%' </#if> GROUP BY roleId,roleName) AS tb
